message:
Dear Alertistas,

There is far too much happening right now for me to cross-post everything onto Convore & Meetup, so please keep an eye on the SCMLA Facebook feed. You do not have to be a member of Facebook to look at the feed.

http://www.facebook.com/scmla

Thanks!

Kim M.

Kim, I no longer have a facebook account. When I go to www.facebook.com/scmla I get a mostly blank webpage, that identifies itself as the scmla facebook account. I don't see any stories to read, news or anything substantial. I am embarassed at my failure with this! Am I missing something?
I just changed the privacy settings to the lowest possible. It should now be viewable by everyone. Let me know if it worked.
P.S. I'm probably only going to post SUSPICIOUS ACTIVITY REPORTS & other original content on Convore for the time being.
